name: Air Glow Hockey
description:
Air Glow Hockey offers an original way to play air hockey game. It's an easy game to play but difficult to master. Play a quick game against the computer or try the multiplayer mode for two players. If you want a challenge you can also play a tournament in the arcade mode.

FEATURES:

- 2 player mode (you can play in the same device).

- Arcade mode (challenge yourself with the computer in 6 rounds with a different difficulty and 6 types of pitch).

- 1 player mode (play against the computer and choose your difficulty level: easy, medium, hard and very hard).

- Colorful graphics with glow style.

- Air hockey rules: the first person to score 7 points by shooting the puck into the opponent’s goal wins the game.

- Physical realistic and easy control.
